message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,000. I believe it will provide significant value at this price point.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $9,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,500 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,250?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,800?
